title: A  Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Multi-Center Study of HTN-295 (ACE inhibitor) in Patients With Psoriasis
officialTitle: A  Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Multi-Center Study of HTN-295 (ACE inhibitor) in Patients With Psoriasis
description: This is a  double-blind, placebo-controlled multi-center study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of HTN-295 (ACE inhibitor) in patients with Psoriasis. The study will enroll approximately 356 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 21-61 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Psoriasis
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
